name: Campaign2020Fundraising
0:
”Alexa, open Campaign Fundraising.”
”Alexa, ask Campaign Fundraising how much cash has Bernie Sanders spent?”
”Alexa, ask Campaign Fundraising who has raised the most money from individual donors?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: campaign fundraising
des: The Campaign 2020 Fundraising uses data from Federal Election Commission reports filed by the presidential campaigns and makes them available to be searched via voice commands. You can can Alex how much money a campaign has raised, how much has been spent, and who has taken the most money from PACs and individual donors. It’s a great way to explore how candidates are raising and spending their money.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
